title: Untitled
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Pierre Alechinsky [b. 1927], Paris, France. Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, by 1977; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1985 [1].

Notes:
[1]. The watercolor was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on May 13, 1985. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1985 year-end gift was taken on February 6, 1986.
